description:
沪江英乐：Lady Antebellum 第5张专辑首支打榜单曲《Bartender》！他们请来了乳神 Kate Upton 助阵，美得摄人心魄，浓烈酒精与荷尔蒙的激烈交汇令人激动难耐。酒保的变异更加令人心惊胆战。

【Lady Antebellum 第5张专辑首支打榜单曲《Bartender》】

歌词：

8 o'clock on Friday night I'm still at home

All my girls just keep on blowing up my phone
Saying come on, it ain't worth the pain
Do what you gotta do to forget his name
Now there's only one thing left for me to do
Slip on my favorite dress and sky high leather boots
Check the mirror one last time
Kiss the past goodbye

What I'm really needing now
Is a double shot of Crown
Chase that disco ball around
'Til I don't remember
Go until they cut me off
Wanna get a little lost
In the noise, in the lights

Hey bartender pour 'em hot tonight
'Til the party and music and the truth collide
Bring it 'til his memory fades away
Hey bartender

Tonight I'll let a stranger pull me on the floor
Spin me round and let 'em invite a couple more
But before it goes too far
I'll let me down easy
'Cause tonight it's all about
Dancing with my girls to the DJ
Put that song on replay

What I'm really needing now
Is a double shot of Crown
Chase that disco ball around
'Til I don't remember
Go until they cut me off
Wanna get a little lost
In the noise, in the lights

Hey bartender pour 'em hot tonight
'Til the party and music and the truth collide
Bring it 'til his memory fades away
Hey bartender

I'm feeling that buzz
I'm ready to rock
Ain't no way I'm gonna tell you to stop
So pour that thing up to the top
I'm coming in hot

Hey bartender
What I'm really needing now
Is a double shot of Crown
Chase that disco ball around
'Til I don't remember
Go until they cut me off
Wanna get a little lost
In the noise, in the lights

Hey bartender pour 'em hot tonight
'Til the party and music and the truth collide
Bring it 'til his memory fades away
Hey bartender

description:
"Orange Is The New Black" star Natasha Lyonne is ditching her orange jumpsuit for at least one day in Brooklyn. HBO confirms the actress has signed on to join Hannah, Marnie and the rest of the "Girls" for one episode of Season 4. 《女子监狱》女演员Natasha Lyonne是可以暂时脱下剧中的监狱橙色连体衣了。HBO电视台已经确认，她将会加入Hannah、Marnie主演的美剧《衰姐们》第四季中的一集。

Lyonne can currently be seen as inmate Nicky Nichols in Netflix's "Orange Is The New Black" and her previous TV credits include "Law & Order: SVU" and "Weeds." 现在Lyonne出演的《女子监狱》正在Netflix播出，她在此前还出演过《法律与秩序：SVU》和《单身毒妈》。

The network would only confirm the actress' character's name would be Rickey. Will she play a new love interest for Ray? 目前HBO只愿透露她将会扮演一个名叫Rickey的角色。这个角色会是Ray的新爱人吗？

We'll just have to wait and see when HBO's "Girls" returns in early 2015. 让我们拭目以待2015年在HBO电视台回归的《衰姐们》吧！
